name: Deeper and Deeper P.I. Agency
description:
Windows 64bits game for Ludum Dare 48

THEME: Deeper and deeper

You're a private eye of the famous private investigation agency: Deeper and Deeper. You heard a rumour about Aliens who have infected the humans, called Deep Parasite or DEE-PR.  Go with your camera through the village and find them to have the proof!

Thanks for playing!

-o-0-o-

Controls: Keyboard and mouse

Investigator movement:

  • Point and click with the left mouse button  (not available in Photo Mode)

Camera movement:

  • WASD (or ZQSD for AZERTY keyboard) to pan (not available in Photo Mode)
  • Right mouse bouton + mouse movement to rotate

Activate/Deactivate Photo Mode:

  • P key or click on the Photo Mode HUD button

In Photo Mode, change the "Depth painter settings":

  • Left Mouse button while pointing at a bystander

Quit to main menu:

  • Click on the HUD icon representing an power on button

In the main menu:

  • Click on "Play" to start the session
  • You can select your keyboard between QWERTY and AZERTY (default QWERTY) before starting the session
